metadata.title: CVE-2018-13304 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libavcodec in FFmpeg 4.0.1, improper maintenance of the consistencybetween the context profile field and studio_profile in libavcodec maytrigger an assertion failure while converting a crafted AVI file to MPEG4,leading to a denial of service, related to error_resilience.c, h263dec.c,and mpeg4videodec.c.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
dvbcut: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mythtv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
kino: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
